title: How can I check my hours in this game?
body: Asking cause of the veteran rewards. I don't know exactly how many games I've played on my account.

replies.body: We don't currently have a way to show how long you've played or further details about the veteran rewards.  Hang tight for more news on this, and keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for these updates!

https://wol.gg
It only keeps records of rank games and won't calculate normal games.
